column3: EWURADZE a ɔma asenaman paapaa no hɔ nsu wɔ ɔbɛsɛber; na ɔbɛma nsu atɔ berdzedzeedze ama hom
column4: na hom nyina enyinya sar mu mfunoma."

column5: na nkɔnhyɛfo no ehu atorsɛm; na adaasofo ka akɔhwisɛm
column6: wɔdze nsɛnhun kyekye werɛ kwa: dɛm ntsi ɔman no fa hɔn kwan dɛ nguan

column3: na mebɛtsea dɛm mpɔnkyenyin no: na dɔm EWURADZE abɛsera no nguankuw Juda fi no
column4: na ɔdze hɔn bɛyɛ n’enyimnyam pɔnkɔ wɔ ɔsa mu."
akodzi egyen na apempensifo nyina bɔbɔ mu fi aba."

column2: "Na wɔbɛyɛ dɛ akatakyi a wotsiatsia abrɔn mu dɛtse do wɔ ɔko no mu; na wɔbɔko osiandɛ EWURADZE nye hɔn wɔ hɔ; na hɔn a wɔtse pɔnkɔ do no enyim bogu ase."

column5: na mehu hɔn mbɔbɔr; na wɔbɛyɛ dɛ gyama manntow hɔn annkyen: na emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn

column3: na hɔn akoma edzi ehurusi dɛ gyama nsa ntsi a: ɛhɛɛ
column5: na woedzi ehurusi; hɔn akoma enyi bɛgye EWURADZE mu."

column3: na maboa hɔn ano; osiandɛ mapon hɔn: na wɔbɔdɔr dɛ mbrɛ wɔadɔr yi."

column2: "Na mubodua hɔn amanaman mu; na wɔbɛkaa me wɔ ekyirekyir nkurow mu: na wɔnye hɔn mba benya nkwa
"Medze hɔn befi Egypt asaase so do aba bio
column3: na maboa hɔn ano efi Asiria; na medze hɔn bɛba Gilead na Lebanon asaase do; na wonnkenya kwan ama hɔn mpo."

column4: na Nael mu ebun nyina awewew: na Asiria no nkontompɔ no abrɛ adze
column5: na Egypt ahempoma no eefi hɔ akɔ."

column2: "Na mebɛhyɛ hɔn dzen wɔ EWURADZE mu; na wɔbɛnantsew afow esian wɔ EWURADZE dzin mu."
